document.full_text: what could blunt government assaults by armored vehicles on rebel positions and anti-qaddafi cities would be modern, precise anti-tank weapons -- but rebels would need weeks of training to put them to use.
document.title: at war: libya's rebel forces need more than just weapons
lines_and_colors: what could blunt government assaults by armored vehicles on rebel positions and anti-qaddafi cities would be modern, precise anti-tank weapons -- but rebels would need weeks of training to put them to use.
